# GCControllerInputState

**Class**

A class that represents an input state for gamepads and arcade sticks.

## Declaration

```swift
class GCControllerInputState
```

## Overview

This class implements the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevicePhysicalInputState] protocol for gamepads and arcade sticks. Instances of this class represent the state of the controller’s inputs at a moment in time, which can be the current time.

## Accessing controller input

- **input**: The input profile for the controller.
- **GCControllerLiveInput**: The input profile for a controller.
